WorkItem.Description:
I want to develop a plug-in for window explorer in such a way that a custom folder named as My repository(as shown in attached image) would appear in left pane of explorer.
And when we click on it we would like to call a web service behind the scene and display its sub directories on RHS pane as well in LHS pane(in form of treeview).
As we can't directly map the directory , that's why we will be using web service.
 
Please give some suggestion how to customize explorer or extend the window shell in such a manner.
 
Thanks,
kpant
